channel.title: So i tried to sponsor my server... and
channel.description:
well I applied to sponsor my server and waited like 56 hours or something longer then 24-48 and I bid $40.00 usd... well I looked today and im not even on the bidding page.... and theres people that only bid $25.00 and up on there.... can someone please tell me why im not on there? I run server EX0TiC Scape on second page of online servers...
but I never did send money thru paypal idk how it all works ive never done it before the rules to sponsoring are a bit confusing to me ... but idk hopefully I can still try to sponsor it

item.title: So i tried to sponsor my server... and
item.dc:creator: @si_force Si Force
item.description:
@si_force wrote:

Moderators generally don’t deal with sponsored servers, so I can’t really provide much advice on the subject. However, info on this thread may be of use to you. You may have to re-submit your bid if it is not appearing at all.

Also, remember to not PM staff members about approving your application, it’ll be considered when the time comes.

Read full topic
item.source: So i tried to sponsor my server... and

item.title: So i tried to sponsor my server... and
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

Wrong section. Posting here can do nothing but get you useless replies by normal users. If you want help on this, PM a staff member.

Read full topic
item.source: So i tried to sponsor my server... and
